item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，ServiceNow 即将以高达 70 亿美元的价格收购网络安全初创公司 Armis
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周六援引知情人士的话报道称，ServiceNow 公司正在就收购网络安全初创公司 Armis 进行深入谈判，Armis 公司曾有意在明年进行首次公开募股，这笔交易的估值可能高达 70 亿美元。【原文：ServiceNow is in advanced talks to buy Armis, a cybersecurity startup that had been eyeing an initial public offering next year, in a deal that may be valued at as much as $7 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，可口可乐公司为挽救 Costa Coffee 的出售举行最后谈判
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周六援引知情人士的话报道，美国软饮料公司可口可乐拟出售 Costa Coffee 的交易面临破裂风险，该公司本周末将与私募股权公司 TDR Capital 举行最后的谈判，以挽救这笔交易。【原文：U.S. soft drinks company Coca-Cola's proposed sale of Costa Coffee is at risk of collapsing, with the company holding last-ditch talks this weekend with private equity firm TDR Capital in an effort to salvage the deal, the Financial Times reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储独立成疑，最高法院会再次支持特朗普吗？
item.description: 美国最高法院的保守派大法官们似乎已经准备好支持唐纳德-特朗普总统不顾国会给予的工作保护而解雇监管机构官员的权力。但在下个月即将开庭审理的一个重要案件中，他们表示不愿赋予特朗普对美联储的类似权力。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court's conservative justices appear ready to endorse President Donald Trump's power to fire a regulatory agency official despite job protections given by Congress. But they have signaled reluctance to give him similar authority over the Federal Reserve in a major case set to be argued next month.】

item.title: 许多特朗普选民表示，物价上涨让他们感到吃不消：不要责怪总统
item.description: 当罗恩-戴利外出就餐时，菜单上的价格让他大吃一惊。【原文：When Ron Dailey goes out to eat, he is shocked by prices on the menu.】

item.title: 报告显示，华为最新手机使用改进型中国制造芯片
item.description: 加拿大研究公司 TechInsights 称，华为技术公司最新旗舰 Mate 80 系列手机的芯片麒麟 9030 由中国顶级代工厂中芯国际制造，改进后的版本为 7 纳米，仍落后于台积电和三星。【原文：The Kirin 9030, the chip that powers Huawei Technologies' latest flagship Mate 80 series handset, has been manufactured by China's top foundry SMIC with an improved version of 7 nanometres, which is still behind TSMC and Samsung, Canadian research firm TechInsights said.】

item.title: 美国议员要求了解特朗普决定向中国出售英伟达 H200 芯片的详情
item.description: 美国国会众议院两党中国问题特设委员会主席、美国议员约翰-穆莱纳尔（John Moolenaar）周五要求商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）解释唐纳德-特朗普总统允许英伟达（Nvidia）向中国出售其H200芯片的决定的细节。【原文：U.S. lawmaker John Moolenaar, the chair of the U.S. House of Representatives' bipartisan select committee focused on China, on Friday asked Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick to explain the details of President Donald Trump's decision to allow Nvidia to sell its H200 chips to China.】

item.title: 比特币囤积者公司 Strategy 仍在纳斯达克 100 强之列
item.description: 上周五，比特币囤积巨头战略公司（Strategy）在纳斯达克100指数中的排名继续保持不变，在分析师对其商业模式提出质疑之际，该公司在该指数中的排名延续了一年之久。【原文：Bitcoin hoarding giant Strategy clung to its place in the Nasdaq 100 on Friday, continuing its year-long stint in the benchmark at a time where analysts have raised questions over its business model.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：SpaceX 设定 8000 亿美元估值
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）已授权内部人员出售股份，对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）公司的估值约为 8000 亿美元。【原文：SpaceX has authorized an insider share sale that values Elon Musk's company at about $800 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 加拿大西捷航空公司暂停推出不可调节座椅，征求乘客反馈意见
item.description: 西捷航空公司（WestJet Airlines）周五表示，将在下周暂停推出不可调节的经济舱座椅，以测试附加文化的局限性，因为它面临着对可调节座椅收取额外费用的反弹。【原文：WestJet Airlines said on Friday it would pause its rollout of non-adjustable economy seats next week, testing the limits of add-on culture as it faces pushback for charging extra for adjustable seats.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，摩根大通戴蒙表示支持凯文-沃什出任美联储主席
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，摩根大通高层杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）表示支持前美联储理事凯文-沃什（Kevin Warsh）担任下一任美国央行主席。【原文：JPMorgan top boss Jamie Dimon signaled support for former Federal Reserve Governor Kevin Warsh as the next chair of the U.S. central bank, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国将新空军一号的交付日期推迟至 2028 年年中
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周五报道，美国空军已将两架新型空军一号喷气机中首架喷气机的预期交付时间再推迟一年，至 2028 年中期。【原文：The U.S. Air Force has delayed the expected delivery of the first of two new Air Force One jets by another year to mid-2028, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 巴西 Azul 航空公司债务重组获破产法院批准
item.description: 美国破产法官周五批准了 Azul 的债务重组，允许这家巴西航空公司削减 20 多亿美元的债务，并通过新股配售以及美国航空公司和美国联合航空公司的投资筹集资金。【原文：A U.S. bankruptcy judge on Friday approved Azul's debt restructuring, allowing the Brazilian airline to cut more than $2 billion in debt and raise capital through a new equity rights offering and investment from American Airlines and United Airlines .】

item.title: Live Nation、Ticketmaster 必须面对涉及价格的大规模集体诉讼
item.description: 加利福尼亚州的一名联邦法官周五裁定，Live Nation 及其子公司 Ticketmaster 必须代表数百万美国人提起集体诉讼，因为它们涉嫌在全国各大音乐会场馆的活动中多收费用。【原文：A federal judge in California ruled on Friday that Live Nation and its subsidiary Ticketmaster must face a class action on behalf of millions of Americans for allegedly overcharging them for events at major concert venues across the country.】

item.title: 美国两党议员呼吁对合成 DNA 序列实施出口管制
item.description: 美国两党议员本周提出法案，要求美国公司在出口合成 DNA 序列之前必须获得许可。【原文：A bipartisan group of U.S. lawmakers this week introduced bills that would require U.S. firms to obtain a license before exporting sequences of synthetic DNA.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称本周降息是美联储的正确举措
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周五在 LinkedIn 上发帖称，她赞成在本周的货币政策会议上降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said on Friday in a LinkedIn posting that she favored cutting interest rates at this week's monetary policy meeting.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，特朗普称他倾向于由沃什或哈希特领导美联储
item.description: 华尔街日报》周五援引对特朗普的采访报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他倾向于由前美联储理事凯文-沃什（Kevin Warsh）或国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）在明年领导美联储。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he is leaning toward former Fed governor Kevin Warsh or National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett to lead the Federal Reserve next year, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday citing an interview with Trump.】

item.title: 西南航空公司将于 2026 年在奥斯汀开设机组基地，创造 2000 个工作岗位
item.description: 美国西南航空公司周五表示，将于 2026 年 3 月在奥斯汀-伯格斯特罗姆国际机场开设一个机组人员基地，创造 2000 多个工作岗位，以扩大其在快速发展的得克萨斯州中部的业务范围。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Friday it would open a crew base at Austin-Bergstrom International Airport in March 2026, creating more than 2,000 jobs as the carrier looks to expand its footprint in fast-growing central Texas.】

item.title: 加密货币集团 Tether 提交收购意大利尤文图斯足球俱乐部的报价
item.description: 加密货币集团 Tether 周五表示，它已向阿涅利家族的控股公司提交了一份全现金收购方案，以收购其在意大利历史上最成功的足球俱乐部尤文图斯（Juventus）的全部股份。【原文：Crypto group Tether said on Friday it has submitted an all-cash proposal to the holding company of the Agnelli family to buy its entire stake in Italy's most historically successful soccer club Juventus .】

item.title: 汽车零部件制造商 First Brands 任命 Charles Moore 为临时首席执行官
item.description: First Brands 周五表示，在破产重组过程中，公司已任命查尔斯-摩尔（Charles Moore）为临时首席执行官。【原文：First Brands said on Friday it has appointed Charles Moore as the interim chief executive amid its bankruptcy restructuring process.】

item.title: 特朗普的人工智能令面临政治和法律障碍
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的行政命令旨在禁止各州制定有关人工智能的法律，因为他认为这些法律会延缓创新。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's executive order seeking to bar state laws on artificial intelligence that he says slow innovation will face political and legal opposition from states seeking to preserve their right to regulate the rapidly growing technology.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Wealthfront 在纳斯达克上市，估值 26.3 亿美元
item.description: Wealthfront 周五在纳斯达克首次上市时股价开盘持平，按全面摊薄计算，这家自动化数字财富管理公司的估值为 26.3 亿美元。【原文：Wealthfront's shares opened flat in their Nasdaq debut on Friday, valuing the automated digital wealth management company at $2.63 billion on a fully diluted basis.】

item.title: 供应紧张和 AI 需求如何推动铜价飙升至 12,000 美元
item.description: 随着人工智能数据中心的需求预期飙升以及供应紧张与美国以外地区的短缺相冲突，铜价正逼近每吨 12,000 美元大关。【原文：Copper is closing in on the $12,000 a metric ton mark as expectations of soaring demand from data centres that power artificial intelligence and tight supplies collide with shortages outside the United States.】

item.title: 文件显示，在俄罗斯作出裁决后，谷歌面临 1.29 亿美元的法国资产冻结
item.description: 路透社看到的官方命令显示，谷歌已停业的俄罗斯业务管理人已获得临时冻结该 Alphabet 旗下公司在法国约 1.1 亿欧元（约合 1.29 亿美元）资产的许可。【原文：The administrator of Google's defunct Russian business has obtained a temporary freeze on some 110 million euros ($129 million) of the Alphabet-owned company's assets in France, official orders seen by Reuters show.】

item.title: 美国监管机构初步批准加密货币公司成立信托银行
item.description: 包括瑞波（Ripple）和圈子（Circle）在内的加密货币巨头周五获得了最高银行监管机构的初步批准，可以成立国家信托银行，这一重大举措将进一步把数字资产纳入银行系统。【原文：Crypto giants including Ripple and Circle on Friday received preliminary approval from a top banking regulator to establish national trust banks, in a major move that could further integrate digital assets into the banking system.】

item.title: 因美国牛肉供应不足，JBS 将关闭加利福尼亚牛肉工厂
item.description: 全球最大的肉类公司 JBS 周五表示，由于肉牛供应紧张导致肉类包装商成本上升，JBS 将永久关闭洛杉矶郊外的一家牛肉加工厂，该厂主要生产供美国杂货店销售的牛肉。【原文：JBS will permanently close a facility outside Los Angeles that prepares beef for sale at U.S. grocery stores, the world's largest meat company said on Friday, as tight cattle supplies have raised costs for meatpackers.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，甲骨文将用于 OpenAI 的多个数据中心推后至 2028 年
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引熟悉这项工作的人士的话报道，甲骨文公司已将其为OpenAI开发的一些数据中心的完工日期从2027年推迟到2028年。【原文：Oracle has pushed back the completion dates for some of the data centers it is developing for OpenAI to 2028 from 2027, Bloomberg News reported on Friday citing people familiar with the work.】

item.title: Rivian股价大涨，分析师欢呼转向定制自动驾驶芯片和人工智能战略
item.description: 周五，Rivian Automotive 的股价大涨 18%，原因是分析师对这家电动皮卡和 SUV 制造商开发用于自动驾驶功能的定制芯片以及整合人工智能的努力发表了看好的评论。【原文：Shares of Rivian Automotive surged 18% on Friday as analysts issued bullish commentary on the electric pickup truck and SUV maker's efforts to develop a custom chip for self-driving features and its integration of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 花旗集团的扭亏进展获得摩根大通赞赏
item.description: 摩根大通（J.P. Morgan）分析师周五上调了花旗集团（Citigroup）的评级，华尔街券商对这家美国第三大银行在首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）领导下长达数年的扭亏为盈努力投下了信任票。【原文：Citigroup was upgraded by analysts at J.P. Morgan on Friday, in a vote of confidence from the Wall Street brokerage for the third-largest U.S. lender's years-long turnaround efforts under CEO Jane Fraser.】

item.title: 鉴于通胀过高，美联储哈马克倾向于收紧政策
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）周五表示，鉴于她本人对经济的看法，她倾向于货币政策比目前更为紧缩。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said Friday that given her own take on the economy she would prefer monetary policy to be tighter than it is currently.】

item.title: 冰淇淋分拆让联合利华面临实现增长和利润的压力
item.description: 随着 The Magnum 冰淇淋公司的供应链寒流过去，联合利华面临着压力，必须证明其向美容和健康的转变能够促进增长和提高利润率。【原文：With The Magnum Ice Cream Company's supply-chain chills gone, the pressure is on Unilever to show that its shift towards beauty and wellbeing can fire up growth and margins.】
